name: Endless 2D Runner
description:
Collect Green Badges for points and Blue Badges for an ability powerup that pushes back the enemy. Try to reach 50 points to win!

CONTROLS:

Space - Jump

Q - Use Ability when you have collected 5 blue badges

Endless 2D Runner game created for a school project

Resources Used:

https://craftpix.net/product/pixel-art-space-2d-game-backgrounds/ (Background)

https://www.spriters-resource.com/fullview/69585/ (Moon)

https://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/fnafworld/sheet/85101/ (Freddy Player Sprites)

https://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/fnafworld/sheet/79679/ (Purple Guy Sprites)

https://www.spriters-resource.com/wii_u/hyrulewarriors/sheet/80616/ (Blue and Green Badge Sprites)

https://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/eccodolphin/sheet/143038/ (Ability Bar Sprite)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=la2W_ZiE1es (Background Music)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AuS-cIzX_cw (Ability Use Sound Effect)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=561qHylVC_o (Jump Sound Effect)
